content.question: The petition could best be used as evidence by historians studying which of the following?

choices.label: The effects of new transportation links on industry in the Northeast
The lives of immigrant laborers constructing new infrastructure
The ideas that led some Americans to advocate for improved transportation
The reasons that regional interests opposed internal improvements

content.answer: The ideas that led some Americans to advocate for improved transportation

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
